content: As it has opinions and conventions, it also helps making an unknown redux-driven codebase more approachable, in the same way that create-react-app / angular does. I can understand a redux app faster than a somwhat simpler custom app. I scan the state, the reducers actions s and have already understood 80% of what matters in the codebase. It is a strong feature for the community of developers that will fix my bugs!
